library.description:
SharedEvents (SE): library for exchange events, data and tasks between browser tabs.

Requirements: Blob, Blob.URL, Worker, localStorage
library.name: __SE__

library.description: Ultra-fast implementation of reactivity for javascript
library.name: cellx

library.description: The object-observer pattern in javascript. Listen to changes that happen on your deep objects and arrays.
library.name: observe

library.description:
Capo is a module that serves for managing event-driven js architectures and encourages mediator pattern usage solving its biggest weakness - uncertainty of event triggers and listeners.
It creates report containing triggers and subscriptions of events.
library.name: capo
